caiUniGenlvl.name: caiUniGenlvl
caiUniGenlvl.description: This string displays the genlevel of the product.

caiUniConfig.name: caiUniConfig
caiUniConfig.description: This string displays under what configuration CA-Unicenter is running, i.e., Client/Server or just standalone

caiUniLicExp.name: caiUniLicExp
caiUniLicExp.description: This string displays the license expiry date for the product.

caiUniLstMsg.name: caiUniLstMsg
caiUniLstMsg.description: This string displays the last Event/Message which was received by the Event Manager. This object type is also used when defining TRAPs to send CA-Unicenter messages in a trap.

caiUniCltSrv.name: caiUniCltSrv
caiUniCltSrv.description: This integer value will tell the user if CA-Unicenter in the queried node is a client, server, or just a standalone.

caiUniStatTable.name: caiUniStatTable
caiUniStatTable.description: This table will provide information about what components are active in CA-Unicenter.

caiUniStatEntry.name: caiUniStatEntry
caiUniStatEntry.description: This provides the list of entries for the above table.

caiUniStatEntIdx.name: caiUniStatEntIdx
caiUniStatEntIdx.description: This provides the sequence/index number of a component being checked for status.

caiUniStatComp.name: caiUniStatComp
caiUniStatComp.description: This provides the string that displays the status of a component being checked.

caiUniSecuT1.name: caiUniSecuT1
caiUniSecuT1.description: Reason: CAISSF resource check could not be evaluated because the security daemon is not running. Action: Start the security daemon. Msgref: CASF_E_461

caiUniSecuT2.name: caiUniSecuT2
caiUniSecuT2.description: Reason: Access violation to an asset has occurred. Action: Appropriate permissions need to be granted. Msgref: CASF_E_465

caiUniSecuT3.name: caiUniSecuT3
caiUniSecuT3.description: Reason: Userid suspended for password violations. Action: Contact system administrator. Msgref: CASF_E_480

caiUniSecuT4.name: caiUniSecuT4
caiUniSecuT4.description: Reason: Userid suspended for rule violations. Action: Contact system administrator. Msgref: CASF_E_481

caiUniSecuT5.name: caiUniSecuT5
caiUniSecuT5.description: Reason: Password violation by user. Action: Enter another password. Msgref: CASF_E_482

caiUniSecuT6.name: caiUniSecuT6
caiUniSecuT6.description: Reason: The communications path between the security engine's master daemon and one of its rule evaluators has failed. Action: Verify the status of IPC facilities on your system. Msgref: CA_SCTY_E_001

caiUniSecuT7.name: caiUniSecuT7
caiUniSecuT7.description: Reason: A communications error occurred when a rule evaluator attempted to send a request back to the security engine master daemon. Action: Verify the status of IPC facilities on your system. Msgref: CA_SCTY_E_004

caiUniSecuT8.name: caiUniSecuT8
caiUniSecuT8.description: Reason: The security daemon has lost IPC with CAIENF system. Action: Verify the status of IPC facilities on your system. Msgref: CA_SCTY_E_034

caiUniScheT1.name: caiUniScheT1
caiUniScheT1.description: Reason: A Main Monitor function has encountered more than ten consecutive CAICCI failures. This message is a warning of possible network problems. Action: Investigate CAICCI and network status. Msgref: CASH_W_0132

caiUniScheT2.name: caiUniScheT2
caiUniScheT2.description: Reason: Workload monitor attempted to submit a job, but found that a required resource is not defined in any global or station resource table. Action: Either add the resource to a global or station table, or remove the resource requirement for the job. Msgref: CASH_E_0470

caiUniScheT3.name: caiUniScheT3
caiUniScheT3.description: Reason: Workload monitor received a failure record from the CAIENF tracking function on a specified node. Action: Review the logs SCHDEN2.nnnn and SCHDEN4.nnnn to determine the cause of failure. Msgref: CASH_E_0471

caiUniScheT4.name: caiUniScheT4
caiUniScheT4.description: Reason: Workload remote tracking task discovered that CAIENF is not active on the specified node. This means that no tracking data is being recorded on that node. Action: Start the CAIENF tracking task on this node. Msgref: CASH_W_0479

caiUniScheT5.name: caiUniScheT5
caiUniScheT5.description: Reason: An unauthorized user attempted to update either the assigned user (SUBUser) or the submitted file (SUBFile) field. Action: Contact your security administrator. Msgref: CASH_E_0492

caiUniScheT6.name: caiUniScheT6
caiUniScheT6.description: Reason: The main monitor tracking task has marked job and its qualifier to have aborted at a specified time and code. Action: Informational Message. Msgref: CASH_I_0062

caiUniScheT7.name: caiUniScheT7
caiUniScheT7.description: Reason: The main monitor tracking task has marked job and its qualifier to have interrupted at a specified time. Action: Informational Message. Msgref: CASH_I_0063

caiUniScheT8.name: caiUniScheT8
caiUniScheT8.description: Reason: The main monitor tracking task has marked job and its qualifier to have purged at a specified time. Action: Informational Message. Msgref: CASH_I_0065

caiUniGuiT1.name: caiUniGuiT1
caiUniGuiT1.description: Reason: The GUI main message router (CaMRouter) has abnormally ended. Action: Use the uniclean command and then restart the GUI main message router with the command unistart gui. Msgref: CAMR_F_MAINROUTER

caiUniTapeT1.name: caiUniTapeT1
caiUniTapeT1.description: Reason: The volume serial number of the mounted tape volume does not match the volume serial number requested. Action: Mount the requested tape volume. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS011

caiUniTapeT2.name: caiUniTapeT2
caiUniTapeT2.description: Reason: A resident tape volume, whose volume serial number matches the volume serial number requested, was mounted in response to a request for a nonresident tape. Action: Mount the nonresident tape volume. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS012

caiUniTapeT3.name: caiUniTapeT3
caiUniTapeT3.description: Reason: A nonresident tape volume was mounted in response to a request for scratch tape. Action: Mount a resident scratch tape. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS013

caiUniTapeT4.name: caiUniTapeT4
caiUniTapeT4.description: Reason: The tape volume that was mounted in response for a scratch tape has a nonblank LOCATION in the corresponding volume definition in DB. Action: Mount a different scratch tape. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS014

caiUniTapeT5.name: caiUniTapeT5
caiUniTapeT5.description: Reason: The first 17 chars of the file name stored on the tape's header HDR1 label do not match those in the FILE17 field in the corresponding volume definition. Action: Verify the labels. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS015

caiUniTapeT6.name: caiUniTapeT6
caiUniTapeT6.description: Reason: Either the tape volume mounted has a future expiry date or it is not in scratch status. Action: Mount a valid scratch tape. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS016

caiUniTapeT7.name: caiUniTapeT7
caiUniTapeT7.description: Reason: Either the age threshold or error threshold has been exceeded for the tape volume mounted, causing the volume to be flagged as a bad tape in the DB. Action: Mount a valid scratch tape. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS024

caiUniTapeT8.name: caiUniTapeT8
caiUniTapeT8.description: Reason: This user is not authorized to relabel tapes. Action: Contact CA-Unicenter security administrator. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS025

caiUniTapeT9.name: caiUniTapeT9
caiUniTapeT9.description: Reason: An attempt was made to initialize or mount a tape volume that is defined to the Tape Mgmt DB but is not in active service. Action: Use the CATAPE ACTIVE VOLUME control statement to place the tape volume in active service. Msgref: CAI_E_TMS026

caiUniAsmT1.name: caiUniAsmT1
caiUniAsmT1.description: Reason: This message is issued when a medium does not exist in the specified device for an MNTREQ or SCRREQ. Action: Load the medium or specify another device which has a medium. Msgref: CASM_E_NOTAPE

caiUniAsmT2.name: caiUniAsmT2
caiUniAsmT2.description: Reason: This message is issued when a medium is not at loadpoint for an MNTREQ or SCRREQ. Action: Rewind or specify another device. Msgref: CASM_E_NOTATLP

caiUniCciT1.name: caiUniCciT1
caiUniCciT1.description: Reason: CCI CA90s service has shut down. Action: Informational. Msgref: CAICCI_I_1003

caiUniEnfT1.name: caiUniEnfT1
caiUniEnfT1.description: Reason: ENF CA90s service has shut down. Action: Informational. Msgref: CAIENF_S_0036

comments: Produced by pysmi-0.3.4 at Tue Apr 20 15:08:24 2021
